title: Busy hands
creator_credit: A Bhaskarrao, M. Bhavnani and Films Division, Government of India
brief_description: This film shows villagers as they attend cottage industries classes held in their communities in which families learn weaving, rope making, tailoring, tanning and leather work, pottery and other useful trades. NB: Print unable to be screened due to shrinkage.
